Name: adult dermatomyositis
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by restriction of both active and passive range of motion located_in the scapulohumeral joint and has_symptom pain and has_symptom restricted range of motion.

Name: childhood type dermatomyositis
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by restriction of both active and passive range of motion located_in the scapulohumeral joint and has_symptom pain and has_symptom restricted range of motion.
